description: Number of permutations of length n with 1 fixed and 1 reflected point.
comments: Number of distinct solutions to the order n checkerboard problem, including symmetrical solutions: place n pieces on an n X n board so there is exactly one piece in each row, column and main diagonal. Compare A064280.
references: Simpson, Todd; Permutations with unique fixed and reflected points. Ars Combin. 39 (1995), 97-108.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
